TopicTitle: What do you want the Kerbals to be?

Articles.Content:
After reading a few thread where people say different things about what the Kerbals need to survive, I wanted to see what everyone actually wants for the Kerbals. Should they be plants or animals?

Plants require water, nutrients/food, a visible light source, temperature, CO2 and oxygen.

Animals require water, oxygen, food, and temperature.

I think they are hybrid creatures. Lets look at the evolution of the planet. In the beginning, there was some oceans and only sparce grassy covering of the planets. Then the kerbaliths came. Therefore, I envision the kerbals to be plankton, some massive prokaryotic bit of algae!
I like to imagine them as being something of a hybrid between plants and mammals, very similar to the Supox of Star Control, but based on some other plant family.
I want Kerbals to be Kerbals. They don\'t need to be anyone else.
